title: how do you battle?
body:
HELP ME I NEED HELP HOW DO YOU BATTLE PPL{{champion:32}} FACE IS SOO GREEN HELP ME 
and him if you think he is green

replies.body:
Once you've logged in you should be able to press Play in the upper left corner and then choose your game type. If you're wanting to play against other people, make sure that PVP is selected after you click Play. You'll then need to choose a game type, and then whether you want to play a normal or ranked match.

Let me know if that cleared things up or if I've just completely missed the point!
